alert.note: Alert for Iowa; Marquette; Sauk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 10:41PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Lafayette, western Green Lake, Iowa, Columbia, western Dane, Marquette and eastern Sauk Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1040 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Napowan Scout Camp to 8 miles north of Friendship to near Wisconsin Dells to 8 miles northwest of Spring Green to near Lancaster to 8 miles northeast of Edgewood. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Middleton, Waunakee, Baraboo, Portage, Mount Horeb, Dodgeville, Prairie Du Sac, Sauk City, Wisconsin Dells, Mineral Point, Lake Wisconsin, Cross Plains, Lodi, Lake Delton, Poynette, Pardeeville, Mazomanie, Spring Green, Montello and West Baraboo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
